channel.title: 525 runescorp!
channel.description:
Credits 30% - Dragonchain 70%- Coding and Release
-Client Credits- Jane 10% For Giving Rachelle 90% For the making
RuneScorp Source http://uppit.com/v/F851LEIV
Changes ive made Well i had enough of pvp servers and ive decided to change it to old RuneScape Pking with Pvp wildy levels and random drops just like RuneScape except everywhere is safe. Question:- Why you do this? Well basically you can still pk but also you can still train skills and enjoy the server without getting killed everywhere you go.
[Other Features] Economy Based Medium Training Dragong Claws With Special Dragon Weapons With Specials Range Gfx Mage Gfx Perfect Edgeville Pking Deposit Box working Full Banking Bounty Hunter Freinds list Perfect Muting System Banning System
